creator: narayanab16@gmail.com
text:
Hi

i downloaded zip archive
catalina-home/lib/catalina-ha.jar
i extracted this jar but i dont see this class included as part of build

class not found exception: org.apache.catalina.ha.session.JvmRouteSessionIDBinderListener

creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com
text:
As expected.

The class has been removed starting with Tomcat 8.0.0,
as mentioned both in Changelog and in Migration Guide

http://tomcat.apache.org/migration-8.html#Clustering
http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-8.0-doc/changelog.html#Tomcat_8.0.0_%28markt%29/Cluster

creator: narayanab16@gmail.com
text:
Ok 

Thanks for the url helps

You can close this defect fromissue tracker
